SELECT a.id number_id, a.theme_number theme_number, a.price price, b.id theme_info_id, b.theme_name theme_name, b.theme_pic theme_pic, b.theme_type theme_type, c.id series_id, c.series_name series_name FROM star_nft_theme_number a LEFT JOIN star_nft_theme_info b ON a.series_theme_info_id = b.id LEFT JOIN star_nft_series c ON b.series_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.is_delete = 0 AND a.status = 2
